full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 Supplemental Life Insurance Plan For salaried and certain hourly employees Publication Number: 59-7123 June, 1985 Benefits described are effective April 1, 1985 Table of Contents page Your Supplemental Life Insurance Plan 1 Eligibility 1 Effective Dates 2 Cost. 2 Life Insurance Coverage 2 Amount of Coverage 3 Retiree Life Insurance 4 For Early Retirees Between Ages 55 and 65 4 For Normal and Late Retirees Age 65 and Over 4 Payment of Benefits 5 Filing a Claim 6 Termination of Coverage 6 Benefits After Termination of Coverage 6 Conversion Privilege 7 Administration of the Plan 7 Discontinuance of the Plan 8 Your Legal Rights 8 PUBLICATION NUMBER 59-7123, JUNE, 1985
